articles.author: Guardian Nigeria
articles.title: How new mosquito nets averted 13 million malaria cases - Guardian Nigeria
articles.description: Ahead of World Malaria Day (WMD) 2024, April 25, the Global Funds to Fight AIDS, TB and Malaria, has said compared to standard nets, the introduction of 56 million state-of-the-art mosquito nets in Nigeria, 16 other countries across sub-Saharan Africa averted…
articles.content:
